features: Plenty of Workspace: The desk's extra large size(70.8"L x 31.5"W) provides ample space for working on a computer, doing paperwork, or conducting meetings. The extra-wide design allows for more space to spread out, which can be especially helpful for those who need multiple monitors or reference materials close at hand

Spacious Leg Room: This large desk features an open area underneath the desk, providing plenty of legroom for comfortable use. This is especially important for taller individuals or for those who prefer to sit with their legs stretched out while working

Multipurpose Use: The desk's versatile design makes it suitable for a variety of uses. As a computer desk, it can accommodate desktop computers or laptops, and as an executive desk, it can provide a spacious and comfortable workspace for professionals. Its large size also makes it an ideal conference table for small to mid-sized meetings

Modern White Industrial Style: The desk's design incorporates modern and industrial elements, giving it a unique and charming aesthetic, and can complement a variety of interior design styles, from modern to traditional

Easy to Assembly: The desk is designed to be easy to assemble and comes with all the necessary hardware and instructions. Most people can assemble the desk in under an hour, without the need for any special tools or expertise

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 63"L x 31.5"W Extra Large Office Computer Desk This large and deep computer desk offers a spacious and versatile workspace, which makes it a great choice for anyone looking for a high-quality desk that can meet a variety of needs, it is a great addition to any office or home office. Take your office space to the next level with this computer table that is versatile and adaptable to your needs, featuring a stunning two-color splicing design in black and retro brown, as well as smooth lines and exquisite finishes that exude sophistication and elegance
Works Well as a Office Conference/Meeting Table: Create a space that is conducive to comfort and productivity with this large office table that can be easily accommodate 6 people

Plenty of Workspace 63” L x 31.5” W large size desktop provides ample spaces for your computer, printer and still leave you spacious workspace for home office activities Spacious Leg Room Open-concept design allows your office chair to fit well under the desk, you can stretch comfortably and switch from left to right freely without any obstruction Enhanced Stability Sturdy metal frame with adjustable leg pads in the bottom for easy leveling on uneven floor and protect floor from getting scratched
Specifications Overall Dimensions 63" Wx 31.5"D x 29.5"H Inch Item Weight: 60 lb Color: Rustic Brown/Black Material ‎Engineered Wood + Metal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this desk!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a large table type desk to use in my RV. This one fits perfectly in the space, gives me a lot of desk space and is a lighter weight which I needed for an RV.It went together fairly easily. The instructions weren’t totally clear but we got it. I highly recommend two people working on it together as otherwise pieces slip.It’s very stable and doesn’t jiggle.I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size desk for working from home
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised with the multi piece desk top and seems . But it looks nice - and is a good size. It is a good value for the price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised. Very nice looking and strong. Not cheap at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Quality Control
reviews.reviewText: Good design on the desk, but terrible quality control and zero customer support. The problems: 1) One of the legs was badly dented and the plastic foot can not be attached. 2) One of the corners on the top had part of the lamination broken off. 3) Several places on the metal sections were dented or scratched. 4) Difficult and time consuming to assemble. 5) The driver that was included did not include a HEX bit. Many of the screws are hex screws. Without a hex bit, it is impossible to tighten these screws properly. I wrote the company explaining the issues. They were completely unhelpful and finally told me they "couldn't find me" in their system even though I provided my order number twice! I will not buy from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars With time it bubbles and discolors
reviews.reviewText: Made of three pieces, had it for a month and a half as computer table spilled once wiped up quickly. Now I cleared it off and under the pad it's bubbled and discolored.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two for my office, they are FANTASTIC! Love the look, easy to assemble, easy to clean and very sturdy! Great buy and I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the size, it gives me plenty of space to recline. If you want a desk with space for your legs and recline, this one is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This is a study table. The surface is scratch resistant. The top is solid not hollow like some of the other products offered. I have only one complaint that kept this from being 5 stars for me. The front edge on this table is rather sharpe not rounded. If this had a rounded front edge it would be 5 stars.
It took 1.5hr to put together. It's a great desk, my wife wish she ordered this instead of what she ordered.
